name: Organization
title: Organization
description: An organization such as a school, NGO, corporation, club, etc.

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID
fields.description: The identifier of the item.

fields.name: additionalType
fields.title: Additional Type
fields.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: The name of the item.

fields.name: serviceArea
fields.title: Service Area
fields.description: The geographic area where the service is provided.

fields.name: subOrganization
fields.title: Sub Organization
fields.description: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.

fields.name: members
fields.title: Members
fields.description: A member of this organization.

fields.name: aggregateRating
fields.title: Aggregate Rating
fields.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

fields.name: reviews
fields.title: Reviews
fields.description: Review of the item.

fields.name: awards
fields.title: Awards
fields.description: Awards won by or for this item.

fields.name: foundingDate
fields.title: Founding Date
fields.description: The date that this organization was founded.

fields.name: founders
fields.title: Founders
fields.description: A person who founded this organization.

fields.name: dissolutionDate
fields.title: Dissolution Date
fields.description: The date that this organization was dissolved.

fields.name: events
fields.title: Events
fields.description: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.

fields.name: logo
fields.title: Logo
fields.description: An associated logo.

fields.name: employees
fields.title: Employees
fields.description: People working for this organization.

fields.name: department
fields.title: Department
fields.description: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.

fields.name: parentOrganization
fields.title: Parent Organization
fields.description: The larger organization that this local business is a branch of, if any.

fields.name: legalName
fields.title: Legal Name
fields.description: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

fields.name: foundingLocation
fields.title: Founding Location
fields.description: The place where the Organization was founded.

fields.name: owns
fields.title: Owns
fields.description: Products owned by the organization or person.

fields.name: founder
fields.title: Founder
fields.description: A person who founded this organization.

fields.name: location
fields.title: Location
fields.description: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.

fields.name: areaServed
fields.title: Area Served
fields.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
